message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
